description: An SDK for interacting with gcEMV blockchain
name: soda-sdk

scripts._dist-stats: gzip -k9f -S '.gz' ./dist/soda.min.js && gzip -k9f -S '.gz' ./dist/soda.umd.min.js && gzip -k9f -S '.gz' ./dist/wordlists-extra.min.js && du -hs ./dist/*.gz && echo '' && du -hs ./dist/*.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-commonjs
scripts.build-clean: npm run clean && npm run build && node lib.esm/_admin/update-version.js && node lib.esm/_admin/update-changelog.js && npm run build-all && npm run _build-dist && npm run _dist-stats
scripts.build-dist: npm run build && npm run _build-dist && npm run _dist-stats
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist lib.esm lib.commonjs && cp -r misc/basedirs/* .
scripts.test-coverage: c8 -o output -r lcov -r text mocha --no-color --reporter ./reporter.cjs ./lib.esm/_tests/test-*.js | tee output/summary.txt
